welcomeDescription: An anonymous platform designed to support organizations like Hatsala. Guardian Sphere helps employees manage stress, trauma, and fear through advanced AI assistance.
highlight1Description: Employees can access a confidential AI assistant for help.
highlight2Description: Participate in anonymous group conversations for shared healing.
highlight3Description: Access videos and tools to work on personal growth.
feature1Description: Talk to an AI assistant for instant, personalized support.
feature2Description: Track your treatment and progress over time.
feature3Description: Admins receive anonymized statistics to understand employees' needs better.
review1: “Guardian Sphere has transformed the way we handle workplace stress.”
review2: “The group therapy sessions have been a game-changer for me.”
